issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
`@id/btn_donot_connect` is not a sibling in the same `RelativeLayout`
`@id/btn_close` is not a sibling in the same `RelativeLayout`

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.
Overriding `@style/AppTheme` which is marked as private in com.microsoft.identity.client:msal. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.
Overriding `@attr/strokeWidth` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.
Avoid using `"px"` as units; use `"dp"` instead
Avoid using `"px"` as units; use `"dp"` instead

issue.message: The image `app_icon.webp` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: mipmap-hdpi/app_icon.webp: 51x51 dp (76x76 px), mipmap-mdpi/app_icon.webp: 58x58 dp (58x58 px), mipmap-xhdpi/app_icon.webp: 44x44 dp (87x87 px), mipmap-xxhdpi/app_icon.webp: 51x51 dp (152x152 px), mipmap-xxxhdpi/app_icon.webp: 45x45 dp (180x180 px)
